scripts.build:all: bun run build:core && bun run build:blocks && bun run build:gui

scripts.build:gui: bun run build -- packages/gui/editors/mpyblocks packages/gui/editors/arcade packages/gui/editors/tankwar packages/gui
scripts.build:blocks: bun run build -- packages/blocks/extensions/light packages/blocks/extensions/time packages/blocks
